mapper.select: select u.id user_id from apts.pri_user u where u.id=#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and (u.organ_id in (0,1) or exists (select 1 from apts.pri_role_users ru join apts.pri_role_menus rm on ru.role_id=rm.role_id where rm.menu_id=#{menuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ru.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}))
